data.title: HOME
data.text:
Sun Valley Academy is dedicated to advancing the educational landscape with a clear academic intention – to enrich the lives of our students and contribute positively to society. Our mission revolves around instilling in students a strong foundation of values, including sound morals, diligence, intellectual curiosity, and competence. We go beyond traditional education by fostering personal and social responsibility, aiming to cultivate enlightened leadership qualities that resonate throughout their lives.

At Sun Valley Academy, our educational program is crafted with the overarching goal of "opening the mind" to excellence across all facets of life. We believe in inspiring students to reach their full potential, both academically and personally. Our curriculum is designed to promote comprehensive growth, ensuring students are well-prepared for the challenges and opportunities that lie ahead.

Message From the Director

It is my immense pleasure to welcome you to Sun Valley Academy, Silapathar. We have started its journey to lead the youth of today to be the leaders of tomorrow. We have tried our level best to run an ideal junior college to achieve the optimal potentials of our students.

Our college is filled with enthusiastic students willing to learn, supportive parents interested in their children’s education and a dedicated professional staff committed to provide the students with quality education, which are amplified by full furnished infra structure, ample space for classroom transaction, fully equipped laboratory and library. We are very much delighted to share with you that we use information and communication technology for our academic development. Moreover our faculties use digital content which will enable learners to acquire the competency easily and firmly.

With best wishes.

Amit Nath

Director

Sun Valley Academy, Silapathar
